entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm along parts of the coast. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm along parts of the coast. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
